name: I'm just a Squid
description:
This is a game created for the Ludum Dare 33 game jam.

You play as a giant squid who is attacked by adventurers. You must use your mighty squid tentacles to destroy the ships.

Make sure not too fixate on just one ship. It takes a moment for your tentacles to be ready to strike a second time!

Things I didn't get to do: polish art/animations; music; my own sound effects.

You can see the Ludum Dare page here

Question can be directed here or Twitter
